text:
Odd/Random bug I found.

When creating a static list with v3 endpoint. I get the ListID back.
But when I create and create a new workflow using that segment block with that v3 ListID HubSpot returns a 500 error.

When I create a static list with v1 endpoint, I get the ListID back.
BUT Iâ€™m able to create a workflow using that ListID in the segment block. HubSpot returns a 200.

Not sure if this is the best place for this comment or if I should move it into <#C2YHAHB6K|api> or <#C019VT42R8X|workflows>.
